interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: ALLKEM Nude Tone Medium Square Soft Gel full cover Nails 504 Pcs Review Date: 2022/11/15 Store: ALLKEM Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Size': 'Medium', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'ALLKEM', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Package Dimensions': '9.84 x 5.51 x 1.61 inches; 8.15 Ounces', 'UPC': '850022264085'} Review Text: I ordered the medium square and I got the short almond.Now these are two very different shapes and length that I’m not happy about.these are pretty yes but will I have to alter how I planned for to do my nails yes.But what I can say is that these have a nice color and the led UV lamp is able to cure the gel under
9/10 would recommend to a friend. Review Title: Wrong shape Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
L’ANGE HAIR Wide Tooth Comb Tortoiseshell Acetate | Lightweight, Smooth, Compact Design | Easy Glide Wide Tooth Comb L'ANGE HAIR {'Product Dimensions': '0.25 x 7 x 3.13 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2427', 'UPC': '810108190974'} This comb is the cutest thing.It fits in my purse since it’s super thin.It does come with a white carrying case which I appreciate.I’ve use it as a pick since I have type 4 hair and I wear it out quite a lot and it works fine.
8/10 would recommend to a friend. Fits into purse very easy ANGNYA Solid Gel Polish Palette 9 Colors Cream Gel Nail Polish Popular White Pink Nail Gel Nude Gel Polish Upgraded Nail Art Painting Manicure for Nail Design at Salon Home DIY (#2) ANGNYA {'Brand': 'ANGNYA', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Pink,White', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '3.62 x 2.8 x 0.87 inches; 3.84 Ounces'} These colors are to die for.I’ve always loved nude polishes and these don’t disappoint.Super easy to spread and cure in a UV/LED lamp in a minute.The only thing is that the plastic protective sheet over the polishes was hard to remove.
10/10 would recommend to a friend. Works very well 8 Sheets Skull Nail Art Stickers 3D Self-Adhesive Acrylic Nail Kit Designs Charms Nail Stickers Heart Skull Snake Black Nail Sticker Designer Nail Art Supplies for Women DIY Nail Decoration LRKNNO {'Brand': 'LRKNNO', 'Color': 'Flame', 'Surface Recommendation': 'Nail', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Theme': 'Skull', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Installation Type': 'Self-Adhesive', 'Reusability': 'Single Use', 'Pattern': 'Variety Pack', 'Shape': 'Heart', 'Package Dimensions': '5.75 x 4.06 x 0.16 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} First thing first you will need tweezers to get the sticker off.It come with a big selection of stickers which is always nice.I applied a gel top coat on the nail and the blend was seamless.
100/10 would recommend to a friend. Super cute NEW GENERATION Dual-Ended Face Shapping Stick, Cream Contour Stick, Concealer and Bronzer Stick Moisturizing Long lasting (02&03) KUAILEGO {'Product Dimensions': '3 x 1 x 1 inches; 3.53 Ounces'} These were very easy to use since it took two seconds to blend into the skin.I do wish the colors were a bit more pigmented,I was expecting darker colors.And as you can see the first color use ended up looking like baby powder on my skin no matter what I would do.I might end up using it as a eyeshadow base instead.
6/10 would recommend to a friend. It’s okay Jade Roller for Face Women Ice Jade Roller Bottle Essential Oil Roller Bottles Multifunctional Facial Massage Skin Care Beauty Tool (Pink) ROMALOVE {'Package Dimensions': '6.7 x 2.4 x 1.4 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'ROMALOVE'} When I ordered this I didn’t realize how bit it really was.I’m able to fit a whole bottle of my serum in it.It would also be great for a cuticle oil on the go.I haven’t been using it long enough to notice a big change with the jade but it does feel nice on my undereye.
6/10 would recommend to a friend. So big ALLKEM Nude Tone Medium Square Soft Gel full cover Nails 504 Pcs ALLKEM {'Size': 'Medium', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'ALLKEM', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Package Dimensions': '9.84 x 5.51 x 1.61 inches; 8.15 Ounces', 'UPC': '850022264085'} I ordered the medium square and I got the short almond.Now these are two very different shapes and length that I’m not happy about.these are pretty yes but will I have to alter how I planned for to do my nails yes.But what I can say is that these have a nice color and the led UV lamp is able to cure the gel under
9/10 would recommend to a friend. Wrong shape
profile:
User Summary:

- **Hair Care**: Maintains a strong interest in hair care tools, particularly those designed for textured hair (type 4), emphasizing effective styling and maintenance.
- **Nail Care**: Engaged in a variety of nail care products, showcasing a passion for creative nail designs and unique decorative elements. Recently, the user encountered an issue with a nail product that didn't match their expectations, reflecting a desire for accuracy and quality in product purchases.
- **Makeup Interest**: Willingness to explore makeup products, including multifunctional items like cream contour and bronzer sticks, but prefers higher pigment levels and emphasizes ease of use and blending.
- **Convenience**: Favors lightweight and compact beauty products that fit easily into a bag, reflecting a lifestyle that prioritizes portability and practicality.
- **Practicality**: Appreciates multifunctional items, demonstrating an ongoing exploration of beauty tools that complement their existing preferences for convenience and aesthetic coherence.
- **Aesthetic Value**: Values stylish, attractive designs in all beauty products, emphasizing visual appeal alongside functionality.
- **Quality Focus**: Chooses products of varying quality while balancing performance with aesthetic appeal. The user shows an interest in the effectiveness of products, as seen in their reviews and interactions.
- **Recommendation Behavior**: Open to sharing product suggestions with friends, highlighting a social aspect in their beauty experiences and a desire to promote positive finds. 

Overall, the user is continuously exploring beauty products that enhance their routines while maintaining a critical focus on quality and design.
